title: [SOLVED]Backlight 820-3208
message:
Liquid spill on this board, i change R9731 & R9715, i have BKL_EN=2,7V
PPBUS_S0_LCDBKLT_FUSED=8,35V
PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT=8,35V
i remove C9796 look bad, is it necessary?
is it U9701, i don't see more damaged components

the board work well on external display.

title: [SOLVED]Backlight 820-3208
message: LP8550 or the feedback trace to ball A5 on LP8550.

title: [SOLVED]Backlight 820-3208
message:
I remove LP8550 U9701 but C13 is missing TP_BKL_FAULT i don't see on schematic if this net is necessary.
Can you confirm if i put a new one, the missing pin is stopping the device from working?

title: [SOLVED]Backlight 820-3208
message: Unused pin. Make sure to check ball A5 trace for continuity!

title: [SOLVED]Backlight 820-3208
message: Ok i change LP8550 now the light come back, i test it all the night and i come back tomorow, thanks
